waliweriya rathupaswala di ikuth da siduwu kalabalakari siddhiya sambandhayen yuda hamuda mulika parikshana usawiya magin me wana wita pudgalayan haththa dedenakugen prashna kara sakki satahan karagena thibe.gatume di thuwala labuwan ha siddhiyata muhuna pa samanya wasiyan, pujya pakshaya,yuda hamuda samajikayan saha siddhiya asin dutuwan athulu kandayamaka gen mese sakshi labagena thibenaatharayuda hamudawe pamanak ehi samajikayin 58 denekugen pamana me siddhiya pilibanda mulika parikshana usawiya magin sakki labagena athi bawa adhyaksha brigediyar ke.je. jayawira mahatha pawasiya.pasugiya dewana da sita me dakwa kalayedi me sakki labagena thibe.pradeshaye pawathwagena yana paudgalika aayathanayakin pitakarana rasayanika drawyayak hethuwen awata linwalin labaganna bhugatha paniya jalayata wisa musuwi athi bawa pawasamin ikuth palamu wanida rathupaswala athulu awata gammana dolahaka pamana pirasak adala aayathanaya asala,nuwara para balummahara handiya ha waliweriya pradeshawala raswi udghoshana ye yedunaha.ehidi athiwu kalabalakari wathawaranaya hethuwen aarakshaka ansha janathawa athara gatumak athiwimen pudgala marana saha thuwala siduwiya.yuda hamudapathi luthithan jenaral daya rathnayaka mahatha hamudapathi lesa siya nilaye wada baragena paya wisihatharak yamata pera me thaththwaya athi wu athara me siddhiya pilibanda parikshana pawathwimata mulika parikshanaadhikaranayak siya dhuraye katayuthu arambaa dinak gatha wimata pera sthapitha kerini.ehi sabhapathi lesa mejar jenaral dabliw.ee.je.si.dayas,da samajakayan lesa brigediyar waru wana ke.je.jayawira,en.ayi. da silwa, karnal ti.di.wirakon saha lekam lesa luthithan karnal dabliw.ji.ee.di.dabliw.nanayakkara yana yuda hamuda jyeshta nilayan pas denagen samanwithawa pathkerunu mulika parikshana usawiya magin siddhiya pilibanda parikshana edinama arambaana ladi.mese pathkala nilamandulla sakaskala nila warthawa ikuth21 da yuda hamudapathiwaraya wetha baradena ladi..

thunwana bhagaya anagatha uwadurakadi prayojanaya sandaha thanpath kala yuthu athara rajabali aadi panchawidha wu bali sandaha yedawiya yuthuya.thama dahadiya mahansiyen upaya sapaya gath bhogayen pasuwa “udaggikan dakkhinan pathittapesi’ mathu aathma bhawayanhi di mebadu bhoga sampath labima sandahath dewlowa diwya sampath sandaha hethuwanna wu dakkhinarhayan udesa dan diya yuthuya.mebandu dhana paribhojanayen thrupthiyata path pudgalaya ‘yadaththan bhogan ichcheyya’ - pandithe siramawasan so me aththo anuppaththo kathan anuthappiya’ yanuwen dhanaya dahamin ras kale ‘ma wisin waladana ladaha (bhuththa bhoga) poshanaya kala yuththe da poshanaya kalemi (bhathabhachcha) aapadawakadi pala prayojanaya sandaha (withinna aapadasume) thanpath kota atha.

wayasata wada wilasitha karana pasalakata uchitha nowina pawena hetti widiya wage rathran purawagena inna kenak me ape sinhala mis.aadareta kiwuwe "chawula" kiyala.hitapu gamana "juhi chawula" kiyalath kiyanawa.gahanna kotuwa ussan eddi sariye lassa nathnam karubuwe watinakama gana katha kaloth misge kenthiya nathi wenne ayis diya wenawa wage wegayakin.ee kale guti noka berenna karapu thawa deyak wune misge ruwata "juhi chawulage" ruwa samana kirima.latha walpola wage ruwakata sabawin himikak kiyapu sinhala mis ee kale star kenekta samana kirima gana aya sathutu wuna.passe passe me karanne boruwak withthiya mista theruma giya bawa dana gaththe dawasak harak madawana kewitadik karan eddi mis ada juhi chawula wage lassanayi kiyala hamadama gahapu thurumpuwa gahapu dawase "chawula neweyi umbaala wawulata wage ellala gahanne eelanga dawase ka gahala ahu wunoth" .eyin passe kattiyatama theruma giya misge aththa thathwe mistama theruma giya bawa.
mama adayi me paththe aawe.eeth kalin aa aya kiyanawa una kola tika hodayi kiyala.
